sentences.english: On MayDay, people have seven days off work .
sentences.chinese: 在救難信號上，人有七天假工作。

sentences.english: As a matter of fact, Dakota is one of the world's best search and rescue dogs.
sentences.chinese: 其實，達科塔是世上最棒的搜尋救難犬之一。

sentences.english: I hope you have a grand time on MayDay .
sentences.chinese: 我希望你在救難信號上有壯觀的時間。

sentences.english: Aid dogs perform valuable tasks for their owners.
sentences.chinese: 救難犬會爲主人執行重要的任務。

sentences.english: As we all know MayDay is national legal holiday.
sentences.chinese: 當我們全部知道救難信號是國家的法定假日之時。

sentences.english: The rescuers are praised for their courage.
sentences.chinese: 那些救難人員因其所展現的勇氣而受到讚揚。

sentences.english: The rescue team soon found the wrecked boat.
sentences.chinese: 救難隊很快地找到了那艘毀壞的船。

definition: to help the poor/almsgiving for the needy/to assist poor households or poor regions
(Tw) to draw on (others' experience)/to learn from (how others do things)/lesson to be learned (by observing others)
out with the old and in with the new (idiom)
to spare no effort (idiom); to do one's utmost
to offer advice/to make a suggestion
